name: Event.isTrusted
description: The isTrusted read-only property of the Event interface is a Boolean that is true when the event was generated by a user action, and false when the event was created or modified by a script or dispatched via EventTarget.dispatchEvent().

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'Trusted events' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification.
